pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using four $(item)Iron Pickaxes$() - tools of destruction and consumption. Requires $(will)128 demon will minimum$() and consumes $(will)64 will$().

A reagent infused with the essence of consumption and corruption. This catalyst can be combined with an $(item)Imbued Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_consumption)Sigil of Consumption$().

pages.title: Warning
pages.text: This reagent channels dark forces of entropy and decay. The sigil it creates spreads $(blood)AntiLife$() corruption - use with extreme caution.$(br2)Once crafted, the Sigil of Consumption can irreversibly corrupt the world around you.
